divs: Sighting DetailsI Richard carpenter was fishing with 15 are so people at 1230 at night along the river when we saw the objust hover above us,coming from1-270 coming in that way with no lights on at the time, you can seen it easly,why , because it cuase the stars as it was coming to us, a large objust about300 feet circle with a few rod poping out it at diff. ends.then a few smalllight came on blue ,white and a few browns.were you can see most of the bottomsome people began to be frighten, a few ran to cars an left, but later no poliecame, wonder whyYou can see most o the bottom of the craft, alot of objust wereprotruding around it box type, anntas , a few micerwave like things, and otherunknon things.we were alstill at watch it but was not afraid to much,, we saidtoeveryone, that we never hear anyone die seeing them why we stick around andwatch, maybe say hello , one man say we matbe abducted, spooky wow.but it seemcalm look we just hunging aroung for a light show, boy did we get on
